title: Jury begins hearing testimony of Akron cop killer in penalty phase
text:
Jury begins hearing testimony of Akron cop killer in penalty phase 
Published By: Cleveland.com - Today 
A jury is listening to testimony that will lead them to recommend death or prison for Kenan Ivery, who was convicted of killing off-duty Akr...
